libs/mangle/stream/filters/buffer_stream.hpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #ifndef MANGLE_STREAM_BUFFER_H
00002 #define MANGLE_STREAM_BUFFER_H
00003 
00004 #include "../servers/memory_stream.hpp"
00005 #include <vector>
00006 
00007 namespace Mangle {
00008 namespace Stream {
00009 
00014 class BufferStream : public MemoryStream
00015 {
00016   std::vector<char> buffer;
00017 
00018  public:
00019   /*
00020     input = stream to copy
00021     ADD = each read increment (for streams without size())
00022    */
00023   BufferStream(StreamPtr input, size_t ADD = 32*1024)
00024     {
00025       assert(input);
00026 
00027       // Allocate memory, read the stream into it. Then call set()
00028       if(input->hasSize)
00029         {
00030           // We assume that we can get the position as well
00031           assert(input->hasPosition);
00032 
00033           // Calculate how much is left of the stream
00034           size_t left = input->size() - input->tell();
00035 
00036           // Allocate the buffer and fill it
00037           buffer.resize(left);
00038           input->read(&buffer[0], left);
00039         }
00040       else
00041         {
00042           // We DON'T know how big the stream is. We'll have to read
00043           // it in increments.
00044           size_t len=0, newlen;
00045 
00046           while(!input->eof())
00047             {
00048               // Read one block
00049               newlen = len + ADD;
00050               buffer.resize(newlen);
00051               size_t read = input->read(&buffer[len], ADD);
00052 
00053               // Increase the total length
00054               len += read;
00055 
00056               // If we read less than expected, we should be at the
00057               // end of the stream
00058               assert(read == ADD || (read < ADD && input->eof()));
00059             }
00060 
00061           // Downsize to match the real length
00062           buffer.resize(len);
00063         }
00064 
00065       // After the buffer has been filled, set up our MemoryStream
00066       // ancestor to reference it.
00067       set(&buffer[0], buffer.size());
00068     }
00069 };
00070 
00071 typedef boost::shared_ptr<BufferStream> BufferStreamPtr;
00072 
00073 }} // namespaces
00074 #endif
